title: React JS

courseList.title: Build a To Do list in React JS

about: React JS is a JavaScript library that is used by web developers to build websites that are more interactive, fast, and responsive. This library is often used to create a Single Page Application (SPA). In this free class we will build a simple online store using HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React JS). Of course we will learn the basics of using this library on our website such as Components, Props, Events, Conditional, and many others.
